column1: Has the founder earned an advanced degree from a reputable university?
Did the founder co-found their current company with a small team?
Has the founder previously held a leadership role in a startup?
Has the founder's previous startup experience included any acquisitions?
Is the founder based in California?
Has the founder worked full-time at a moderate number of companies?
Does the founder have experience in the technology sector?
Has the founder received moderate press or media coverage?
Did the founder start their current company alone?
Is the founder an expert in a specialized field relevant to their startup?
